name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Random GRE Word 隨機單字複習器

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a random GRE word and its meaning every time a new tab is opened. GRE單字隨時複習

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
每次在新的頁籤中 ，隨時複習 GRE單字
Displays a random GRE word and its meaning every time a new tab is opened. 
此擴展的單一用途是每次打開新標籤頁時隨機顯示一個 GRE 單詞及其解釋，幫助用戶隨時複習 GRE 單詞。
